last_episode_to_air.name: The King Of Customs
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hot rodder Gene Winfield is one of the greatest customizers who ever lived. He's won just about every award in the custom car world, and he's run his own creations on the salt flats and dry lake beds where hot rodding was born.

name: Mike Brewer's World of Cars
overview: This Wheeler Dealer is going global! Watch Mike Brewer travel the world to indulge his passion for all things automotive.
